alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ashtabula County through 630 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of North Kingsville to Ashtabula to 6 miles east of Geneva to 9 miles northwest of Orwell. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, North Kingsville, Austinburg, Kingsville, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores, Pierpont, Rock Creek, Edgewood, Plymouth Center and Kelloggsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
